This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pct/CodeSystem/PCTOrgContactPurposeType defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
gferelated GFE-relatedContact details for dealing with issues related to Good Faith Estimate (GFE).
